ABGX Stealth Check is oké...

Ok, my bad. The game does work. I have been having a lot of problems with "Unreadable" discs lately. Especially the newer games.

I re-checked the download. I ran ABGX. It passed. I burned and verified. I put the game in: Unreadable.

So I found out that if you open the disc tray, then tilt the XBox up, almost vertical, for some reason it helps the drive read the discs. That ended up working. Sounds stupid i know, but try it if you have unreadable disc errors. It works.

Anyways, this torrent DOES WORK. I am on NTSC USA Region.
